rComments: I took this in the fall. Lectures can get a little boring, but stay awake for them. He posts his notes online, so if you forgot to copy something down, it'll be there on the website.

Lectures were definitely brutal and hard to stay awake to. Genuinely a nice guy, he'll try to answer any question you have but the answer might confuse you more. Exams were 100% based off assigned homework problems. However, the homework problems were extremely hard.

He gives fare, straight forward homeworks...never tries to trick you. His midterm and final were identical to his practice exams that he gives to the class, just different numbers. Excellent teacher.... the lectures were kinda dull, but he always cracks jokes. He even brings in cool demonstrations.Excellent teacher, take whatever you can with him.

Great professor.  He was enthusiastic and light hearted about a subject that is interesting but can be dull at times.  His lectures were very clear and he always told us what was expected of us.  Highly recommended.
